title: Cover Message
shortDescription: Show visitors announcements and newsletter sign-ups.
longDescription:
Cover message is a great way to get visitors involved in your website!

Cover Message lets visitors sign up for your newsletters, link to exclusive deals and information, or show them important announcements.
author: Cloudflare Labs

categories.title: UI & Design
categories.description: Apps that make your website more beautiful and user friendly.

categories.title: Recommended For Stores
categories.description: Apps for stores in the recommendation engine.
